org.gradle.api.reporting

Interface CustomizableHtmlReport

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.gradle.util.Configurable<Report>, ConfigurableReport, Report, Serializable, SingleFileReport

    @Incubating
public interface CustomizableHtmlReport
extends SingleFileReport
    A HTML Report whose generation can be customized with a XSLT stylesheet.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.gradle.api.reporting.Report
